Alchemical Framework Reference:
- Prima Materia: Understanding the base problem
- Calcination: Breaking down the old
- Separation: Isolating components
- Conjunction: Combining elements
- Fermentation: Adding life/functionality
- Distillation: Refining the solution
- Coagulation: Solidifying the result
